name: Glacies Magi Arena (Jam Prototype)
description:
Made for My First Game Jam Winter 2020: Cold

At first I wanted to make a metroidvania; but then realized I couldn't make such thing in just two weeks with my schedule so I downgraded it to an arena... but even this arena game is unfinished.

Snow slimes are coming from left and right. Use your sword, lance, bow, and gun to kill the slimes. The game does not have a health bar as of now, so the gameplay is about cleaning slimes only.

Control:

  • Arrow keys: movement + jump
  • Z: sword/lance (hold to charge and release)
  • X: bow/gun (hold to charge and release)

Enjoy :)
